body_html:
There was a bug in the schema where the default values of dilation width and height factors were set to 0 instead of 1. This incorrect value will cause the slow kernel to be selected for execution.
This got fixed with recent update to schema, that is the reason you saw the regression in 0.1.7 version.
body_text:
There was a bug in the schema where the default values of dilation width and height factors were set to 0 instead of 1. This incorrect value will cause the slow kernel to be selected for execution.
This got fixed with recent update to schema, that is the reason you saw the regression in 0.1.7 version.
body:
There was a bug in the schema where the default values of dilation width and height factors were set to 0 instead of 1. This incorrect value will cause the slow kernel to be selected for execution.
This got fixed with recent update to [schema](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/e41e70ed9827b81a07c42f68def80f3f61b70375#diff-16ca4f2738c3598cf9b1d79b45eed593), that is the reason you saw the regression in 0.1.7 version.
